test: hey, just starting to use unity. Haven't decided if I like it or not. Where the heck is Gparted and the system tools for managing harddrives???
press ALT+F2 and run:  gksudo gparted     should be ok, if not then install gparted to make sure it is present
worth running:  sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install gparted     just to be sure
